entry.title: My Portfolio
entry.content:
My first Front-End project is this portfolio site. Every project is hosted directly from my GitHub repository GitHub.com/WojtasF

So I wanted to make my personal portfolio website, because I’m learning programming for a few months and after some research I found that hosting site generated by Jekyll on GitHub Pages will be the best soulution, because:

  • Every project is hosted directly from my GitHub repositories;
  • Possibility to set custom domain;
  • FREE Hosting!

What I’ve learned:

  • How CSS pre-compilers works - SASS;
  • How static site generators works;

What I’ve used to make this website:

  • Jekyll - static site generator;
  • Bootstrap - CSS Framework;
  • SASS - CSS pre-compiler;
  • Markdown - markup language;
  • JQuery - JS Framework;
